text: Looking for some help with a custom module..... I created a custom social sharing module by cloning the "social sharing" module from HubSpot. It mostly works, however, the twitter share value for "text" (which should share the title of the post) is empty. It works on the native HubSpot module. Why can't the custom module access the title? BTW I followed this for creating the custom sharing module: <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/design-manager/use-custom-social-icons-on-HubSpot-pages-or-templates>
is it possible to use smart content via hubl code? I need to hide an entire module instead of swapping out the content
I’ve always just wrapped all of module.html in a conditional based on a boolean field when doing this; AFAIK there’s no DND-friendly way to avoid wrapping divs
